summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character, seen from behind, is engaged in combat with an enemy named "Guangmou," as indicated by the health bar at the bottom of the screen. The environment is a lush, forested area with bamboo trees and rocky terrain. The player character appears to be wielding a staff or polearm. There are visual effects suggesting magical or energy-based attacks, with colorful streaks and distortions surrounding the enemy. The user interface includes a health bar for the player at the bottom left, along with icons representing abilities or items. On the left side, there is a hexagonal menu with four icons, possibly indicating available skills or inventory items. On the right side, there are additional icons, with one showing a character silhouette and another displaying a circular gauge, possibly related to combat abilities or status effects.
